mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.resource_type, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.tenant_id AS "tenantId", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent.name", a.system_id As "gnTabSystem"
LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, resource_type, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, tenant_id, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{resourceType}, #{permission}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{tenantId}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, resource_type = #{resourceType}, permission = #{permission}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_menu SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
